default.title: Tasko - Manage Your Work, Clearly
default.description: Tasko is a task and workflow management web app that helps individuals and teams organize work, track progress, and manage approvals in one place.
default.keywords: Tasko, task management, workflow, project management, team collaboration, dashboard, approvals, productivity

login.title: Login - TASKO
login.description: Log in to TASKO and stay on top of your tasks, progress, and approvals.

language.title: Change Language
language.description: Which language would you like to use Tasko in?

theme.title: Change Theme
theme.description: Which theme would you like to use Tasko with?

logout.title: Log out of Tasko?
logout.description: Even if you log out, your account information and settings will be safely saved. You can log in anytime to continue using CAMBOB.

notFound.title: Page not found
notFound.description: We are sorry! The page you are looking for doesn't exist.
